text: How Kamala Harris took control of the Democratic Party  —  Party officials and campaign aides raced to flip an entire brand from fading hope to salute emojis.  —  The boss had earned that much.  Vice President Harris approved no discussions.  Campaign advisers did not break ranks in public.
